segments.text: Do you know where I can find old music boxes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You could try shopping at a flea market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's that ? I've never heard of such a thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A flea market is an outdoor place where people sell all kinds of used stuff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , Where can I find one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you can check the local paper or search â€˜ flea market ' online .
segments.speaker: S2
